reviewText: Best purchase I've made in years.  I have had both hips replaced, neck surgery and back surgery and this has helped me so much.

Does not contain Kettlebell correctional exercises.  Maybe one or two but that is it.  If you think you are going to get a plethora of KB correctional exercises you are sorely mistaken.  Does go more in depth about the FMS though.  If you want to learn more about the FMS then by all means.
Great information and for someone new to the fitness industry, this should be a must watch.

Although there is plenty of new information available from the team at FMS and RKC this is still a great resource for anyone to learn more about the Functional Movement SYSTEM and how to apply it to your training.

Aside from the fact that this is a great price for such a comprehensive set of DVDs & a fact that Dragon Door customer service is incredibly accommodating and easy to work with , this is a best FMS & kettlebell blend on the market right now . An absolute must for rehabilitation specialists , trainers and clinicians .
